rows.label: qst000101_msg001
rows.name: Ah, this is a problem[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst000101_msg002
rows.name:
Nopon are unreliable
as a fighting force[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst000101_msg003
rows.name:
And asking the Superbians for
help is out of the question[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst000101_msg004
rows.name: Hm? Ah, well[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst000101_msg005
rows.name:
I have some cargo at the port,
brought from Invidia for trade[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst000101_msg006
rows.name: And it's become a bit of a nuisance.

rows.label: qst000101_msg007
rows.name: What should I ask?

rows.label: qst000101_msg008
rows.name: Ask if someone is targeting it.

rows.label: qst000101_msg009
rows.name: Ask if it's something illegal.

rows.label: qst000101_msg010
rows.name: That's a pretty sharp guess.

rows.label: qst000101_msg011
rows.name: Well, my opponents aren't people.

rows.label: qst000101_msg012
rows.name: No, no. It's nothing like that.

rows.label: qst000101_msg013
rows.name: I have a creed: no shady dealings.

rows.label: qst000101_msg014
rows.name:
The truth is, the cargo is a
favorite food of the Trent Krabble.

rows.label: qst000101_msg015
rows.name:
They're after it. The Trent
Krabbles climb onto the deck
and try to steal the cargo.

rows.label: qst000101_msg016
rows.name:
The guards I hired to
protect it were all beaten.

rows.label: qst000101_msg017
rows.name:
So I was looking for someone
to take their place[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst000101_msg018
rows.name:
But I couldn't find anyone,
and I was racking my brains
over what to do.

rows.label: qst000101_msg019
rows.name: You'll take on the job?

rows.label: qst000101_msg020
rows.name:
That's a very welcome
offer. I knew you were
different from the others.

rows.label: qst000101_msg021
rows.name:
The cargo is at Goldmund Return
Port. It's big and stands out,
so you'll spot it right away.

rows.label: qst000101_msg022
rows.name:
Please drive away the Trent Krabbles
that come to steal the cargo.

rows.label: qst000101_msg023
rows.name: I'm counting on you.
